title: CAPSTONE communications restored
summary: Spacecraft controllers have restored communications with a lunar cubesat that went silent shortly after its deployment earlier this week.

title: Satellite companies watching where DoD goes with 5G
summary: Hughes VP Rick Lober says DoD could take advantage of low Earth orbit satellites to deliver 5G for mobile users

title: Communications established with payload on stabilized PSLV upper stage
summary: Indian startup Digantara said July 6 its space-weather monitoring payload ROBI is operational onboard a spent upper stage of India’s Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle.

title: Looking to the future, Virgin Galactic purchases 2 more motherships
summary: The company's goal is to fly 400 revenue flights a year.

title: Virgin Galactic selects Aurora Flight Sciences to build new motherships
summary: Virgin Galactic announced July 6 it signed an agreement with a Boeing subsidiary to build two new aircraft that will be used as launch platforms for its next-generation suborbital spaceplanes.

title: L3Harris makes strategic investment in Mynaric
summary: L3Harris is making a strategic investment in laser communications company Mynaric with plans to make increased use of that technology for space and other applications.

title: New launch vehicles set for test flights from China’s Jiuquan spaceport
summary: Newly-developed orbital and suborbital launch vehicles are being readied for test flights at the Jiuquan spaceport as China’s efforts to foster a commercial space sector advance.

title: SpaceX to continue Starlink network deployment with Thursday launch
summary: Fifty-three more Starlink internet satellites are fastened to the top of a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket for liftoff Thursday from Cape Canaveral, the first of five Falcon 9 flights scheduled for July.

title: World’s rockets on pace for record year of launch activity
summary: If it feels like there are more rockets launching into orbit than ever before, it’s not just you. The world’s launch operators, led by SpaceX and China’s state-run enterprises, launched 72 missions into orbit in the first half of 2022, on pace to break last year’s record of 135 orbital deliveries.

title: SpaceX closing in on South Korean Moon launch
summary: After years of development and delays, South Korea has completed its first deep space spacecraft and sent it on its way to...
